properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 12:59PM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...New Advisory.

* WHAT...Periods of light snow expected. Total snow accumulations
1-3 inches for Truckee and Lake Tahoe areas, with 2-5 inches at
passes including Donner and Mt Rose.

* WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Thursday. Most of the
snow will fall between midnight and 6 AM Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute. Plan on significant
delays and chain controls over I-80 and Highway 50 along with
other roads around Lake Tahoe.
properties.instruction:
Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during
periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to
reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since
it takes longer to stop on slick roadways.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY
